item.title: About
item.description: HI, I’M TONY. I specialize in expert-level information risk and information security program strategy in team settings, individual contributor, and trusted advisor roles. Chasing the dream of information security that pays for itself. Also, a fan of the National Park Service. OSCP, CISSP, CISA, CRISC, CTPRP National Park Service Visits Arches National Park Brown vs. Board of Education National Historic Site Bryce Canyon National Park Canyonlands National Park (2X) Capitol Reef National Park Cedar Breaks National Monument Channel Islands National Park Chickasaw National Recreation Area Crater Lake National Park Grand Canyon National Park (South Rim) Great Sand Dunes National Park Lincoln Memorial Oklahoma City National Memorial Pea Ridge National Military Park Petrified Forest National Park (2X) Redwoods National Park (2X) Rocky Mountains National Park (3X) Sunset Crater National Monument Washington Monument Zion National Park
